Package dbms.util

Class Summary
Char An alternative class to represent strings.
DBMSData Holds description for the data that our DBMS handles.
DiskHandler This class implements a class that handles the static data inside our disk.
Page Describes the page class as our DBMS system understands it.
Record Describes the record as out database understands it.
Table Describes the table as our DBMS knows it.
